smartphone.name: Electroneum
smartphone.method: free Electroneum cloud miner, please enter my referral code in your app '25B389'.
smartphone.shortdescription: Electroneum (ETN) is a a mobile cryptocurrency, that allows mining and offers a wallet for smart phones, designed for simplicity. The Electroneum ICO start date was in September 14, 2017.

smartphone.name: Phoneum
smartphone.shortdescription: Phoneum is a true mobile-only cryptocurrency, designed to deliver a simplified user experience and platform that enables all users, regardless of technical aptitude, to fully participate in the new cryptocurrency economy.

smartphone.name: Cryptotab Browser
smartphone.method: free cloud miner exchanged to bitcoin
smartphone.monitor: unlimited until manually stopped or device restart, buy the pro for boost every 3 hours
smartphone.shortdescription: Used to mine on your own smartphone that consumes large amount of battery, now it is server dependent mining. I don't know what cryptocurrency they are mining but they pay you in bitcoin. The best feature if the multi-level referral system.

smartphone.name: Pi Network
smartphone.shortdescription: Press the button and leave it for a day, even if you turn off your device, it will still run. Unfortunately, the coin is not yet exchangeable.

smartphone.name: Brave Browser
smartphone.shortdescription: A browser that rewards you for your attention with Basic Attention Token (BAT) and respects your privacy. Available on most OS: Android and IOS. Tipping, monetization, crypto wallet, adblock, and tor.

smartphone.name: Cashmagnet
smartphone.method: advertisement viewer and app installer robot
smartphone.monitor: 2 hours - unlimited until manually stopped though depending on how much auxiliary apps you install
smartphone.shortdescription: A robot app that makes your device to watch ads automatically. Just press the button and leave it, then turn off once you are satisfied. Also, it has a 2-level referral system.

smartphone.name: MIB Miner
smartphone.shortdescription: MIB stands for Mobile Integrated Blockchain. The blockchain network is based on the smart phone, the most generlized device with its endless possibilities that is also called as the portable PC. On this Mobile SmartX Blockchain Platform(MSXBP), anyone can download MIB APP on their smartphone to start Mining, send and receive their cryptocurrencies, and use them for payments and exchanges in mobile environment. Now anyone can mine the cryptocurrency with the help of MIB.

smartphone.name: Mintme Miner Coinimp
smartphone.shortdescription: MintMe.com Coin is a transparent, egalitarian, ASIC-resistant and smart contract compatible blockchain protocol, built to be mined via websites. Our project CoinIMP.com already supports MintMe.com Coin website mining. MintMe.com Coin is not a token, but full blockchain so please use our wallet to send and receive MINTME.

desktop.name: Netbox Browser
desktop.shortdescription: A decentralized web browser. Windows exclusive. More products are coming soon. You can stake your rewards as well.

desktop.name: Brave Browser
desktop.shortdescription: A browser that rewards you for your attention with Basic Attention Token (BAT) and respects your privacy. Available on most OS: Android and IOS. Tipping, monetization, crypto wallet, adblock, and tor.

desktop.name: Bittube Browser or Extension
desktop.shortdescription: A browser that rewards you for your time with BitTube (TUBE), have many features, and almost decentralized social video platform bittube.tv. Staking, tipping, monetization, crypto wallet, adblock, and VPN, able to merge with other browsers as an extension i.e. Netbox + Bittube, Brave + Bittube, Cryptotab + Bittube, etc.

smartphone.name: Electroneum
smartphone.method: penambang cloud Electroneum gratis, silakan masukkan kode referensi saya di aplikasi anda '25B389'.
smartphone.shortdescription: Electroneum (ETN) adalah cryptocurrency seluler, yang memungkinkan penambangan dan menawarkan dompet untuk ponsel pintar, yang dirancang untuk kesederhanaan. Tanggal mulai ICO Electroneum adalah pada 14 September 2017.

smartphone.name: Phoneum
smartphone.shortdescription: Phoneum adalah cryptocurrency mobile-only, yang dirancang untuk memberikan pengalaman pengguna yang disederhanakan dan platform yang memungkinkan semua pengguna, terlepas dari kemampuan teknis, untuk berpartisipasi penuh dalam ekonomi cryptocurrency baru.

smartphone.name: Cryptotab Browser
smartphone.method: penambang cloud gratis yang ditukarkan ke bitcoin
smartphone.monitor: tidak terbatas hingga berhenti secara manual atau perangkat dinyalakan kembali, beli pro untuk meningkatkan tambang setiap 3 jam.
smartphone.shortdescription: Dulu menambang di smartphone anda sendiri yang menghabiskan banyak baterai, sekarang ini tidak tetapi kecepatan tergantung pada server. Saya tidak tahu mata uang digital apa yang mereka tambang tetapi mereka bayar anda dalam bitcoin. Fitur terbaik sistem multi-level referral.

smartphone.name: Pi Network
smartphone.shortdescription: Tekan tombol dan biarkan selama sehari, bahkan jika anda mematikan perangkat anda akan tetap berjalan. Sayangnya, koin tersebut belum dapat ditukarkan.

smartphone.name: Brave Browser
smartphone.shortdescription: Browser yang memberi penghargaan atas perhatian anda dengan Basic Attention Token (BAT) dan menghormati privasi Anda. Tersedia di sebagian besar OS: Android dan iOS. Tip, monetisasi, dompet crypto, adblock, dan tor.

smartphone.name: Cashmagnet
smartphone.method: robot penonton iklan dan pengunduh app
smartphone.monitor: 2 jam - tidak terbatas hingga berhenti secara manual, tergantung pada berapa banyak aplikasi tambahan yang anda instal
smartphone.shortdescription: Aplikasi robot yang membuat perangkat anda menonton iklan secara otomatis. Cukup tekan tombol dan tinggalkan, lalu matikan setelah anda puas. Juga, ia memiliki sistem rujukan 2 tingkat.

smartphone.name: MIB Miner
smartphone.shortdescription: MIB terdiri dari Mobile Integrated Blockchain. Jaringan blockchain didasarkan pada ponsel pintar, perangkat paling umum dengan kemungkinan tak terbatas yang juga disebut sebagai PC portabel. Pada Platform SmartX Blockchain Mobile (MSXBP) ini, siapa pun dapat mengunduh aplikasi MIB pada ponsel cerdas mereka untuk memulai Penambangan, mengirim dan menerima mata uang digital mereka, dan menggunakannya untuk pembayaran dan pertukaran di lingkungan seluler. Sekarang siapa pun dapat menambang cryptocurrency dengan bantuan MIB.

smartphone.name: Mintme Miner Coinimp
smartphone.shortdescription: Coin MintMe.com adalah protokol blockchain yang transparan, egaliter, tahan ASIC, dan cerdas, dibangun untuk ditambang melalui situs web. Proyek kami CoinIMP.com sudah mendukung penambangan situs web MintMe.com Coin. Koin MintMe.com bukan token, tetapi blockchain penuh jadi silakan gunakan dompet kami untuk mengirim dan menerima MINTME.

desktop.name: Netbox Browser
desktop.shortdescription: Browser web terdesentralisasi. Windows eksklusif. Lebih banyak produk akan segera hadir. Anda dapat staking hadiah anda juga.

desktop.name: Brave Browser
desktop.shortdescription: Browser yang memberi penghargaan atas perhatian anda dengan Basic Attention Token (BAT) dan menghormati privasi Anda. Tersedia di sebagian besar OS: Android dan iOS. Tip, monetisasi, dompet crypto, adblock, dan tor.

desktop.name: Bittube Browser atau Extension
desktop.shortdescription: Browser yang memberi anda imbalan untuk waktu anda dengan BitTube (TUBE), memiliki banyak fitur, dan platform video sosial yang hampir terdesentralisasi, bittube.tv. Staking, tipping, monetisasi, crypto wallet, adblock, dan VPN, dapat bergabung dengan browser lain sebagai ekstensi, misalnya Netbox + Bittube, Brave + Bittube, Cryptotab + Bittube, dll.

desktop.name: Cryptotab Browser
desktop.shortdescription: A browser that can mine cryptocurrency using your CPU exchanged to bitcoin. The most interesting feature is the multi-level referral system.
